title: The minimum width of the tread without nosing shall be 25 cm
clause_text: The minimum width of the tread without nosing shall be 25 cm. for any staircase in a residential building, other than stairs provided in fire escapes.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: The minimum width of the tread without nosing shall be 25 cm. for any staircase in a residential building, other than stairs provided in fire escapes.
